titleStmt.title: Transcription 24: NLS Wod.Lett.Qu.I (Autograph memorandum by Domhnall Mac Mharcuis)

availability.p: For internal use by the Faclair na Gàidhlig/DASG projects

msItem.title: Answers to Queries to Inverlochy by Domhnall Mac Mharcuis
msItem.explicit: ... but the tennants of that place hurling or filling stons out of the carb broke the urn in peeces.
